content.howToPlay:
Zombies will start to appear in the area when you begin playing the game, coming from all directions. And it's your job to take them out one by one. These zombies are tough, so you have to exercise caution. You can play this game in single-player mode or with other players online, depending on your preference.

Campaign Mode: Play as a single player and view the mission map by choosing the "Campaign" option from the main menu. Each assignment must be finished individually. You can select the team you want to play for when playing campaign mode. You are entitled, for instance, to play for either the first or the second team. Or, you can play as a zombie.Multiplayer Mode: Start a multiplayer game by selecting "Play in America" from the main menu. As a result, you will be brought to the lobby. From this page, you can view available servers or create a new one.

fullContent: Homeâ€º First Person ShooterBlocky Combat SwatBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenBlocky Combat Swat is a 3D shooting game in which the player faces off against pixelated zombies. These zombies might arrive from anywhere and at any time. They may come up to you creeping, sprinting, or sneakily. Stop the zombies from attacking you and wipe them out. These zombies don't die quickly. Just when you think you've shot them and are safe, you'll notice them crawling towards you. You'll have a lot of fun playing this Minecraft-inspired game!How to Play Blocky Combat SwatZombies will start to appear in the area when you begin playing the game, coming from all directions.
